summary: AN ORDINANCE concerning financial relations with the Seattle Popular Monorail Authority; authorizing an interim loan to the Seattle Popular Monorail Authority of up to $20,000,000; authorizing the Mayor and Director of Finance to enter into agreements concerning that loan and its repayment; amending Ordinance 120218; authorizing the establishment of the Seattle Monorail Fund and the 2002B LTGO Monorail Interim Financing Subfund; and making a transfer to and appropriation from that subfund in the 2002 City budget; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
